bill.summary: Methamphetamine Blister Pack Loophole Elimination Act of 2004 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act to eliminate the exemption as a "regulated transaction" for any sale of ordinary over-the-counter pseudoephedrine or phenylpropanolamine products (including blister packs) by retail distributors.
